feature.label: eMoflon Visualization Feature (optional, requires PlantUML)
feature.description:
This feature provides visualization support for meta-models and TGGs.
This feature requires PlantUML to be installed. If the automatic installation does not work, PlantUML can be installed from the following update site: http://plantuml.sourceforge.net/updatesitejuno/
